title: Kaley Cuoco cuddles up to cute pooch on the carpet at annual Much Love Animal Rescue fundraiser
text:
Kaley Cuoco cuddled up to a furry friend Thursday at an animal rescue benefit event in Culver City, California.

The 33-year-old actress held a cute pooch upon arrival at the Much Love Animal Rescue third annual Spoken Woof Benefit at Microsoft Lounge.

The Big Bang Theory star wore a black sleeveless dress with a pleated knee-length skirt to the fundraiser.

Rescue benefit: Kaley Cuoco cuddled up to a furry friend Thursday at an animal rescue benefit event in Culver City, California

Kaley completed her outfit with shiny black shoes.

She accessorized with stud earrings and had her blonde hair up in a bun.

Kaley accentuated her natural beauty with light blue eye makeup and pink lipstick.

Much Love Animal Rescue takes in abused, neglected and homeless animals from the streets and shelters of Los Angeles and finds them loving homes.

Showing support: The 33-year-old actress showed her support for the Much Love Animal Rescue 3rd Annual Spoken Woof Benefit at Microsoft Lounge

Black dress: The Big Bang Theory star wore a sleeveless black dress to the animal rescue benefit

The non-profit animal rescue group since its founding in 1999 has placed more than 3,500 animals into homes.

The Spoken Woof Benefit features stories of animal adoptions by celebrity guests.

Kaley was joined at the event by several stars from Beverly Hills, 90210.

TV star: Tori Spelling attended the benefit along with some of her BH90210 castmates

Elegant look: The 46-year-old actress looked elegant in an embroidered white jacket over a black dress

Hollywood couple: Dean McDermott joined his wife Tori at the benefit

Dog adoption: The Due South star carried a dog available for adoption

Tori Spelling, 46, attended along with her husband Dean McDermott.

Jennie Garth, 47, also showed her support and carried a chihuahua on the carpet.

Gabrielle Carteris, 58, also attended the event.

Cute pooch: Jennie Garth carried a chihuahua on the carpet

Hit show: The actress is known for starring as Kelly Taylor throughout the Beverly Hills, 90210 franchise

Animal fan: Gabrielle Carteris was among the BH90210 cast at the benefit

Black outfit: Christine Elise kept it simple in an all-black outfit

Teaming up: Gabrielle teamed up with Christine who plays a heightened version of herself on BH90210 after portraying Emily Valentine on in Beverly Hills, 90210

Christine Elise, 54, of Beverly Hills, 90210 fame also was in attendance.

She had a recurring role as Emily Valentine in the original series and portrays a heightened version of herself in the BH 90210 reboot.

Tori, Jennie and Gabrielle all held dogs during a group shot on the carpet.

Gabrielle was escorted to the event by her husband Charles Isaacs.

Dog time: Tori, Jennie and Gabrielle each held dogs on the carpet

Husband and wife: Charles Isaacs escorted his wife Gabrielle to the event

Vanessa Lachey, 38, who has a guest role on BH90210 also joined the cast at the event.

Ivan Sergei, 48, who also guests on BH90210 additionally showed his support by attending.

Jerry O'Connell, 45, hosted the event.

Guest role: Vanessa Lachey, 38, who has a guest role on BH90210 also joined the cast at the fundraiser

Tall boots: The actress added some flair with tall black boots

Guest role: Ivan Sergei who plays Tori's husband on BH90210 also was in attendance
description: The 33-year-old actress cuddled up to a furry friend Thursday at an animal rescue benefit event in Culver City, California.
